item.title: Lego Volkswagen T1 Camper Van Led Kit
item.description:
I’ve the Lego Volkswagen T1 Camper van ðŸ›’#ad (which I made a MOC for at Lego T1 Trailer MOC) and just received my LED Lightning Kit ðŸ›’#ad (or AliExpress ðŸ›’#ad) after my experience with the Bugatti Chiron one

It came with a very simple instruction manual (in comparison to the Chiron kit), and was able to have them installed within 10 minutes with minimal disruption to the pieces and powered via a power bank.

item.title: Lego Volkswagen T1 Trailer
item.description:
I got some pieces that were part of a Lego Volkswagen T1 ðŸ›’#ad but couldn’t make for the complete set (which I already owned), so I was checking what mods I could build based on it, and best one, based on the amount of pieces was this one found on Rebrickable.

As I found it to be a bit sad to leave the wheel, and some other elements outside I did some minor changes:
